inclusion.criterion: Age ≥ 16 years and ≤ 65 years at time of enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed with focal epilepsy with prior vEEG confirmation
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Failure of adequate trials of 4 AEDs, with at least 2 due to failure of seizure control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a seizure frequency of ≥ 2 focal seizures/month, including auras, and at least 1 observable seizures/month
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Able to keep a daily seizure diary
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Receiving ≥ 1 AED for treatment of seizures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has a diagnosis of idiopathic ("primary") generalized epilepsy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Planning pregnancy in the next 12 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He has had seizures since age 13 and was recently tapered off Dilantin.
